title: Benchmarking CXR Foundation Models for Clinical Imaging
event: Johns Hopkins – Korea Biotechnology Innovation Symposium
summary: Presented results on multimodal ICU patient state representation using CXR embeddings and EHR data; highlighted translational potential for precision healthcare.

title: Conceptual Design of Extremity MRI Magnet Using MgB₂
event: Korean Society of Superconductivity and Cryogenics (KSSC)
summary: Poster presentation on low-field MRI magnet optimization using MgB₂, focusing on field homogeneity and cryogenic efficiency.
